analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes min gyi skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /

analyzed: phreng ba dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / dar dpyangs ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ngo bo ste /
translated: Garlands, nets, and half-nets and streamers are the nature of the seven aids to enlightenment.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /

translated: The branch of enlightenment of right mindfulness,üîΩthe branch of enlightenment of right discrimination of phenomena,üîΩthe branch of enlightenment of right joy,üîΩthe branch of enlightenment of right pliancy,üîΩthe branch of enlightenment of right samadhi,üîΩand the branch of enlightenment of right equanimity.üîΩ

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
